original_text: Those workers are the carpenters, the builders and the men who work with stones. The leaders of the work must also buy wood. And they must buy stones that are ready to use. They need those things to repair the temple.
korean_text: 곧 목수와 건축자와 미장이에게 주게 하고 또 재목과 다듬은 돌을 사서 그 성전을 수리하게 하라

sentences.original_text: and the men who work with stones
The leaders of the work must also buy wood
sentences.korean_translation: 일의 지도자들도 또한 나무를 사야 합니다

sentences.original_text: And they must buy stones that are ready to use
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 사용할 준비가 된 돌들을 사야 합니다
